author: David Wallace-Wells
title: Best-Case Scenario for Coronavirus Is That It’s More Infectious Than We Think
description: We are stunningly ignorant about the virus that’s shutting down the world. Some of that uncertainty includes reasons for hope.
content:
Were committed to keeping our readers informed. Weve removed our paywall from essential coronavirus news stories. Become a subscriber to support our journalists. Subscribe now.
